name: Research: Cogitate Consortium 2025, Nature Human Behaviour
content:
The Cogitate Consortium (2025) conducted a pre-registered adversarial 
        collaboration across 6 labs testing IIT and GWT predictions. Both theories' 
        specific predictions failed: IIT's sustained posterior synchronization and 
        GWT's prefrontal ignition were not observed as predicted. This is a 
        ScientificClaim with 5-star confidence from a multi-lab pre-registered study.
        

---
Source: Cogitate Consortium 2025, Nature Human Behaviour
Quality Assessment: ★★★☆☆

name: Research: Holt-Lunstad et al. 2010, PLoS Medicine
content: Social connection reduces mortality by 50%. Meta-analysis of 148 studies, 308,849 participants. Holt-Lunstad 2010.

name: Research: Holt-Lunstad et al. 2010, PLoS Medicine
content:
Holt-Lunstad et al. (2010) conducted a meta-analysis of 148 studies 
        with 308,849 participants. They found that social connection reduces 
        mortality risk by 50% (OR = 1.50, 95% CI 1.42-1.59). This effect is 
        comparable to smoking cessation and exceeds obesity and physical inactivity.
        The finding has been replicated across multiple populations and cultures.
        This is a ScientificClaim with 5-star confidence, established status.
